alert.note: Alert for Las Animas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 8:21PM MDT until July 13 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL LAS ANIMAS COUNTY... At 821 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hoehne, or 15 miles northeast of Trinidad, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tyrone, Model and Hoehne. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
